description:
Makina`s Ditto, Number 2, is a teal colored Ditto that transformed into Piplup and Pikachu. Her Ditto`s had wandered away from her and started causing trouble for Ash and his friends as they were transforming into their Pok√©mon and making them mad.
During a battle with Ash, it transformed into Infernape but was no match for Ash`s Infernape.
Team Rocket stole the Ditto`s and planned to give them to the boss but Ash and his friends were able to recover both of them.
name: Metamon #2 (Makina)
